onboarding_sub_title_1: Experience all of Solana, Ethereum, Polygon and Bitcoin in a single bar user-friendly interface.
onboarding_sub_title_2: Store, swap, stake, send, and receive - without ever leaving your wallet.
onboarding_sub_title_3: To get started, create a new wallet or import an existing one.
secret_phrase_sub_title: Save the below phrase outside of your phone in a secure place. With this phrase you can restore your account at any time.
secret_phrase_risk_1: The recovery phrase is the master key to your funds. Never share it with anyone.
secret_phrase_risk_2: RED X Wallet will never ask you to share your recovery phrase.
secret_phrase_risk_3: If you lose your recovery phrase, not even RED X Wallet can recover your funds.
secret_phrase_never_sub_title: Never share your secret phrase with anyone, and store it securely!
secret_phrase_never_sub_title_1: Your 12-word secret phrase is the master key to your wallet. Anyone that has your secret phrase can access and take your crypto.
secret_phrase_never_sub_title_2: RED X does not keep a copy of your secret phrase.
secret_phrase_never_sub_title_3: Saving this digitally in plain text is NOT recommended. Examples include screenshots, text files, or emailing yourself.
secret_phrase_never_sub_title_4: Write down your secret phrase, and store it in a secure offline location!
confirm_secret_phrase_sub_title: Please tap on the correct answer of the below seed phrases
confirm_secret_phrase_incorrect_sub_titl: Selections not matched. Please try again.
create_wallet_success_sub_title_1: Restore your assets and data at any given time
create_wallet_success_sub_title_3: Connect your account to multiple devices
restore_error_sub_title: You have entered the wrong phrase
send_input_address_error: The receiving address is an uninitialized address, are you still sure you want to send?
transaction_detail_empty_sub_title: Sorry, we haven’t found any transaction!
